title: Provides that a county, city, town, village, school district or public benefit corporation may purchase remanufactured commodities
summary: Provides that a county, city, town, village, school district or public benefit corporation performing services that benefit citizens may purchase recycled remanufactured commodities.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to expanding entities that may purchase recycled or remanufactured commodities
